name: Snakie Rolls
description:
Snakie Rolls! 

An endless runner game where you jump and roll how many steps you'll go (before you drop), similar to Snakes & Ladders & Tetris! Landing a block can either be a consequnce, a reward, or nothing at all. The game can get more difficult as you score but there are blocks that give you upgrades! 

This game only has one input.
